scenario_text.value: Minoru! Are you okay?!

That’s my line! All of you got ten fingers
and ten toes?!
For sure. Sorry if we worried you.
Did we go a little too far, maybe?

Thank you... Truly, thank you. No one
would’ve blamed you for abandoning them...

I couldn’t have lived with myself. I’m just
glad we got to save everyone!

Let’s save the chit-chat for later. The fog
is getting way thicker here.

We have to escape soon. Minoru, have Kaito
and the others left already?
Oh yeah, not yet!

They’re still fighting?! Don’t they realize
the fog is coming?!

Even if they did, I’d imagine they can’t
exactly get away.
We gotta do something, or those guys’ll...

(It’s not even a question... We’ll go and
save them.)

(Still, all of us can’t go at once. Someone’s
got to protect Jijimon and the others.)

(Of course, whoever goes faces the most risk.
I can’t ask that of anyone else... I’ll go.)

(Will they object, I wonder? What could I say
to make them understand?)
(I want to go help Kaito and the others...)
I wanna go!
I’ll go look.
Let’s all escape.
I wanna go!

I’m gonna go meet up with those two. You guys
get out of here!
Do...do you know what you’re saying?!

We’re in this mess because everyone went off
to do what they wanted, you know?!

I just can’t imagine they’ll be okay if we
leave them to fend for themselves.
You may be right, but still!

We’ll need to split up if we’re going to
protect these creatures and save the others.
In that case, I want to go. Please, Aoi!

Ohh...fine! I understand, do what you have to
do.
I’ll go look.
I’ll go look for those two!
You’ll come too, won’t you, Agumon?
You know it! Let’s go already!

Just the two of you alone? As if. I’m going,
too!

Yeah! We’ve come this far, I’ll stick with
you to the end!

No, I need you guys to protect everyone
escaping. The fewer people to go, the better.
But, man...
Don’t worry! I’ll protect Takuma!

...Okay.
We’ll escort everyone out of here.
Are you sure, Aoi?!

Takuma will be fine, I’m sure. We’ll just
have to wait for them to return.
Let’s all escape.

It’s dangerous here. We gotta run. Agumon and
I will look for the others.

Just the two of you alone? As if. I’m going,
too!

No, I want you to stay here, Aoi. I need you
guys to protect everyone escaping.
You’ll...come back safe, won’t you?

Yeah, that’s the plan. Take care of Jijimon,
will you?

...Okay.
We’ll escort everyone out of here.

Look at you, acting all cool! And here I get
so much crap when I go off on my own.

You’d better promise, you hear? Bring those
two knuckleheads back with you!
Yeah, I promise.

Well then, everyone, let us take refuge! We
must join up with the other evacuees!
Takuma, Agumon, take care of yourselves!
We’ll be a-okay! You better do the same!

(Hmm... The fog is thick here. There can’t be
much time left.)
(Kaito, Miu... Please be okay.)
